trans-unit.source: Provides information about a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce informazioni su un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> alle applicazioni client di accessibilità.

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms includes built-in accessibility support that allows your application to work with accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Windows Form include il supporto di accessibilità integrate che consente all'applicazione di usare con le applicazioni client di accessibilità.

trans-unit.source: Examples of accessibility client applications include screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities.
trans-unit.target: Esempi di applicazioni client di accessibilità sono incluse funzionalità di utilità di ingrandimento e schermata, le utilità di input vocale, tastiere su dispositivi di input alternativi e le utilità di miglioramento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject> class inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class to provide information about a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject> classe eredita il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> classe per fornire informazioni su un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> alle applicazioni client di accessibilità.

trans-unit.source: Each class that represents a visual part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>—such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>—also contains a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> to provide information about the containing class and perform actions on behalf of accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Ogni classe che rappresenta una parte di visual il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>, contiene anche una classe che eredita da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> per fornire informazioni sulla classe contenitore e eseguire azioni per conto di applicazioni client di accessibilità.

trans-unit.source: There are instances when you will want to provide additional information, such as the name or description of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Vi sono casi in cui è possibile fornire informazioni aggiuntive, ad esempio il nome o descrizione del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controllo, per applicazioni client di accessibilità.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of providing this additional information.
trans-unit.target: Esistono due modi per fornire queste informazioni aggiuntive.

trans-unit.source: To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A> property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Per fornire informazioni limitate sull'accessibilità per i controlli esistenti, impostare il controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A> i valori delle proprietà che verranno segnalati alle applicazioni client di accessibilità.

trans-unit.source: You should change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> property values only in rare situations, such as if you make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> look like a list.
trans-unit.target: È necessario modificare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> i valori delle proprietà solo in rare situazioni, ad esempio se è rendere una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> simile a un elenco.

trans-unit.source: Occasionally, you might require more accessibility information or different accessibility actions to be included with your custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: In alcuni casi, si potrebbe richiedere ulteriori informazioni sull'accessibilità o azioni di accessibilità diversa per l'inclusione personalizzato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.

trans-unit.source: To customize accessibility, you can write your own class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> classes and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per personalizzare l'accessibilità, è possibile scrivere la propria classe da cui deriva il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> classi ed eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are writing a custom row header cell that implements unique custom actions, such as special hit testing within your cell, you should create a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject> class and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si scrive una cella di intestazione di riga personalizzato che implementa le azioni personalizzate univoche, ad esempio l'hit test speciali all'interno della cella, si deve creare una classe che eredita dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject> classe ed eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> exposes its data structure by using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole> values to define the data table hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> espone la struttura di dati utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole> gerarchia valori per definire i dati delle tabelle.

trans-unit.source: For more information on exposing data tables to Microsoft Active Accessibility, see "Exposing Data Tables through Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'esposizione delle tabelle di dati a Microsoft Active Accessibility, vedere "Esposizione di dati tabelle tramite Microsoft Active Accessibility" in MSDN all'indirizzo http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> class without setting the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> senza impostare la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> proprietario di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> class, setting the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property to the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />, impostando la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> sul valore specificato di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location and size of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la posizione e le dimensioni dell'oggetto accessibile.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> che rappresenta i limiti dell'oggetto accessibile.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.Bounds%2A> property retrieves the object's bounding rectangle in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.Bounds%2A> proprietà recupera rettangolo di delimitazione dell'oggetto nelle coordinate dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the accessible child.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero dell'oggetto figlio accessibile.

trans-unit.source: Returns the accessible child corresponding to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto figlio accessibile corrispondente all'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" /> that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> corresponding to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" /> che rappresenta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> corrispondente all'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of children belonging to the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il numero di oggetti figlio appartenenti all'oggetto accessibile.

trans-unit.source: The number of child accessible objects that belong to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> corresponds to the number of visible columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di oggetti figlio accessibili appartenenti a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> corrisponde al numero di colonne visibili in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> property is <see langword="true" />, the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.GetChildCount" /> method includes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" /> in the count of child accessible objects.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> è <see langword="true" />, il metodo <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.GetChildCount" /> include <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" /> nel conteggio degli oggetti figlio accessibili.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the accessible object that has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto accessibile con lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" /> if the cell indicated by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell" /> property has keyboard focus and is in the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" /> se la cella indicata dalla proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell" /> ha lo stato attivo e si trova nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> corrente; in caso contrario, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an accessible object that represents the currently selected <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto accessibile che rappresenta gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> correntemente selezionati.

trans-unit.source: An accessible object that represents the currently selected <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto accessibile che rappresenta gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> correntemente selezionati in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Nome di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Name%2A> property returns a string that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Name%2A> proprietà restituisce una stringa che include il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Index%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" />.

trans-unit.source: Navigates to another accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Passa a un altro oggetto accessibile.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents an object in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> che rappresenta un oggetto nella direzione specificata.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> method will return for each `navdir` value.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente vengono descritti il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> che il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> metodo restituirà per ogni `navdir` valore.

trans-unit.source: Parameter value
trans-unit.target: Valore del parametro

trans-unit.source: Return value
trans-unit.target: Valore restituito

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Down> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Down> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next>

trans-unit.source: An accessible object for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> below the current row.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto accessibile per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> sotto la riga corrente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Up> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Previous>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Up> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Previous>

trans-unit.source: An accessible object for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> above the current row.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto accessibile per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> sopra la riga corrente.

trans-unit.source: An accessible object for the first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> in the row.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto accessibile per il primo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> nella riga.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> is the first cell if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> è la prima cella se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> è `true`.

trans-unit.source: An accessible object for the last <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> in the row.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto accessibile per gli ultimi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> nella riga.

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation> values
trans-unit.target: Tutti gli altri <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation> valori

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: per chiamare codice non gestito.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valore di autorizzazione: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> to which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" /> applies.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> a cui si applica la classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> that owns this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> che possiede questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property has already been set.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta questa proprietà, la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> è già stata impostata.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento padre dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject" /> that belongs to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject" /> che appartiene all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: per chiamare codice non gestito.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valore di autorizzazione: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the role of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il ruolo di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.Row" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.Row" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection" />.

trans-unit.source: Modifies the selection or moves the keyboard focus of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: Modifica la selezione o sposta lo stato attivo dell'oggetto accessibile.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the action that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Select%2A> method will perform for each `flags` value.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente descrive l'azione che <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Select%2A> eseguirà per ogni `flags` valore.

trans-unit.source: Parameter value
trans-unit.target: Valore del parametro

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: Operazione

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> takes focus.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> diventa attivo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> in the row takes focus.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> nella riga riceve lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> viene aggiunto per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> rimossa la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: When you specify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection.TakeSelection> value, the column of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> that currently has focus is the same as the cell that will take focus in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si specifica il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection.TakeSelection> valore, la colonna del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> che ha attualmente lo stato attivo è la stessa cella che avrà lo stato attivo nell'attuale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.

trans-unit.source: For example, if row 10, cell 3 has focus, and you specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection.TakeSelection> for row 15, then row 15, cell 3 will have focus.
trans-unit.target: Se, ad esempio, 10, 3 cella riga ha lo stato attivo e si specifica <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection.TakeSelection> per riga 15, quindi riga 15, cella 3 avrà lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: The first cell in the row will take focus if no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has focus.
trans-unit.target: La prima cella nella riga diventerà attiva se nessun <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> ha lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: per chiamare codice non gestito.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valore di autorizzazione: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit di valori di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is the bitwise combination of the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selectable" /> and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Focusable" /> values.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione predefinita è la combinazione bit per bit dei valori <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selectable" /> e <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Focusable" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.State%2A> property includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selected> value if the all of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> objects in the row are selected.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.State%2A> proprietà include il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selected> valore se tutte le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> vengono selezionati gli oggetti nella riga.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.State%2A> does not indicate whether the row has scrolled out of view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.State%2A> indica se la riga è di fuori della visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Value%2A> property includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.Value%2A> property for each cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Value%2A> proprietà include il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.Value%2A> proprietà per ogni cella nella riga.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Value%2A> returns the string "(Create New)" if the current row is a new row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Value%2A> Restituisce la stringa "(Crea nuovo)" se la riga corrente è una nuova riga.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DataGridViewRowAccessibleObject.Owner" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: per chiamare codice non gestito.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Valore di autorizzazione: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
